Pedimos pra reservarem dois restaurantes, disseram que tinha sido feita a reserva e quando chegamos no local, não tinham feito.

column5: Los Araucanos 2021, Providencia, Providencia, 8320000 Santiago, Chile
column11: O quarto é bastante confortável, grande ótimo banho. Conta com Nespresso, água e refrigerante sem custo adicional! Quarto de fundos tem ótima vista e são silenciosos. Equipe Ótima. A recepcionista Karina nos atendeu maravilhosamente bem e fala português perfeitamente.
column12: Os quartos de frente para a rua são um pouco barulhentos. Ficamos em um destes na primeira noite e o movimento da rua incomodou um pouco. Solicitamos a troca para um quarto dos fundos e fomos prontamente atendidos. Este sim é silencioso e com ótima vista.

column11: Un lugar perfecto!!! Es mucho más lindo de lo que se ve en las fotos, la ubicación es fantástica, el personal súper amable, el desayuno muy rico, la ducha perfecta, la cama muy cómoda. No tengo ninguna queja.
column12: Nada!

column11: El hotel es una casona muy bonita, ubicada en un barrio entretenido, con mucha variedad de restaurantes y bares. El personal fue atento y respetuoso.
column12: El lavatorio del baño tenía mala presión de agua (casi nula) y la pieza mala iluminación.

column11: Una joyita enclavada cerca del cerro San Cristóbal, en un pintoresco barrio con interesante propuesta gastronómica. El personal es sumamente amable y se adelantan a las posibles necesidades de los clientes.

column12:
en la pieza equipo de música muy antiguo (iPod ya no existe)
en el baño las toallas muy lejos de la ducha
Comida poca variedad

column10: Un lugar en el corazón de Bella Vista junto al cerro
column11: La atención del personal fue excelente ! Elizabeth, excepcional por su trato y calidez humana. La ubicación del hotel es muy buena.
column12: La mascota negra sobre la mesa de la recepción y la cantidad de escaleras de la casa.

column11: El personal que trabaja acá es muy eficiente y agradable. El hotel en si es precioso, y la ubicación no puede ser mejor. Totalmente recomendable.
Excelente combinación de una construcción de principios del siglo XX muy bien mantenida, con modernas instalaciones exteriores, como la piscina y bar.
Las dependencias, los espacios que tienen de esparcimiento, el personal muy atento y dispuesto a ayudar, las habitaciones muy cómodas, lugar seguro y camas muy cómodas. Todo
column12: La poca variedad de platos para room service

column11: Excelente ubicación y lo mejor fue la atención
column12: Un poco elevado el precio pues hay que aumentar el IVA

column11: Muy buena La decoración e instalaciones y gran la calidad y calidez de la atención
column12: Mayor aseo de las piezas

column11: excelente desayuno y preciosa la casa. Muy bueno todo! Personal muy amable

column10: Precioso lugar buen servicio lo malo es el ruido en la noche
column12: El ruido del sector en la.l noche
nada
La bañera no me funciono bien y que no tuviese servicios de masaje

column11: Excelente la atención del personal, el desayuno muy personalizado lo cual le da bastante calidad en el servicio. La habitación se percibe un olor delicioso al llegar después de un día de trabajo. En el hotel se siente como en casa.
column12: Deben arreglar el tema del ingreso al hotel debería será automatizado o tener vigilancia 100%. Recomendaría que el ingreso sea cambiado quitar esas dejar que no son muy bonitas. Recomendaría que tuvieran servicio de restaurante al me la práctica la cena o tener convenio con algún restaurante cercano al hotel.

column11: instalaciones y amabilidad de las personas
column12: sonido de otras piezas y del exterior

column11:
la atención del personal del desayunador (Rachel) super cordial amable y ocupada en el bienestar de TODOS los que allí llegaban! irradiaba alegria por doquier!
la atencion del personal del bar también 1000 puntos!! y en general todas las personas que te reciben incluido el portero! una estadía maravillosa!
column12: una habitación un poco mas grande, porque iba con dos niños.

column11: Excelentes instalaciones, la atencion, la habitación, todo perfecto

column10: Noche mágica con el mejor servicio al cliente
column11:
La atención y amabilidad de todo el personal del hotel. 
La habitación muy confortable y de diseño moderno. 
El hotel precioso
column12: Tuvimos una contingencia con la luz de nuestra habitación, pero fueron muy preocupados para compensar la incomodidad y diligentes en solucionar el problema.
Nada

column11: Evaluaciones anteriores evaluaban muy bien el desayuno, lo encontré regular, poca variedad, pobre
hermosa habitación e instalaciones y excelente desayuno
column12: restaurant con mas opciones
falta mantención. poca variedad de comida. cocina muy lenta

column11: La mayoría del personal es muy amable y con buena disposición
column12:
Siento que le falta supervisión en general al servicio y que puede con muy poco esfuerzo mejorar muchísimo el hotel 
me dió la impresión de que en la pagina se vende mejor de lo que realmente son 
esperaba mas

column11: En cuanto a comida unos alfajores que colocan a la hora del te, de la arquitectura el patio interior su iluminación , vegetación , el agua
column12: El ruido exterior que viene de los bares y pub del sector , en la habitación 10 que alojamos se escuchaba muy fuerte

column11:
La ubicación, la arquitectura del edificio y la amabilidad del personal
Muy rico el pisco sour de cortesia.
column12:
La decoración de la habitación, un poco impersonal y sin mucho gusto, esperaba un poco más de la habitación para ser de un hotel boutique.
El frigo bar estaba desprovisto, no tenia ron, ni pisco ni wiskhy, solo cerveza y gin...
El horario de entrada para el desayuno era únicamente hasta las 10:30 am, demasiado poco para los huespedes que están de vacaciones y quieren dormir.
Exceso en el cobro, hotel sobrevalorado

column11: Fui con mi señora en nuestra primera noche de casados. El personal del hotel fue más que amable, hicieron de nuestra estadía algo realmente memorable y las instalaciones eran increíbles. Un hotel lindo, limpio y acogedor. Los tragos del piano bar muy buenos, la piscina temperada deliciosa para pasar el atardecer y el desayuno muy rico. No puedo decir absolutamente nada malo del hotel, incluso cada vez que necesitábamos transporte para ir hacia algún lugar nos conseguían un cabify que se cargaba a la habitación, sin necesidad de llevar dinero y sin el peligro de tener una experiencia desagradable con algún taxista. Realmente se preocupaban de hasta el más mínimo detalle

column10: Hotel ideal para fin de semana romantico
column11: El hotel esta ubicado en una zone excelente, muy cerca del patio bella vista rodeado de muchos restaurantes agradables y muy cerca de lugares emblematicos como la casa de Pablo Neruda, la Chascona... la decoracion es muy bonita, tal y como se muestra en las fotos... el desayuno tipo gourment muy rico... el personal del hotel desde los conserjes hasta las personas encargadas del desayuno muy amables y profesionales... me parece una opcion excelente para pasar un fin de semana en un ambiente bonito, acogedor y agradable ...

It is a beautiful property and the staff were very welcoming and helpful. The standard room was on the small side but it didn't bother me too much. A bathtub would have been nice. It is a good location next to San Cristobal Hill and close to restaurants and nightlife. In the room at night I was not bothered by any street or nightclub noise at all, however we stayed on a Tuesday and Wednesday night. One girl at reception was very helpful in calling a restaurant on our behalf and was successful at getting them to reverse a cancellation charge for a booking we cancelled within their specified timeline.
column12: There could have been more options for breakfast

column11: The boutique style , nice house and the location . Very nice staff
column12: Some facilities, for example, there’s no electricity plugs in the bathroom . No enough space for the luggage, and the closet us very small. And noisy at night , due to the aerea . Night clubs , bars

column10: romantic haven in the most happening neighborhood
Great place to stay, fantastic staff
column11:
Overall, a great experience. The hotel is a beautifully restored mansion.
The staff is very helpful and friendly. Any question or request is met with a prompt answer and above all a smile.
column12: Nothing bad to say, really.

column10: Great staff, beautiful setting, fabulous breakfast.
column11: A luxury boutique hotel. We were enchanted by the setting and the attention to detail in the decor. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We would highly recommend this hotel.
column12: What's not to like about this gem?

column11: Beautiful hotel with excellent staff. Staff at breakfast were particularly good and helpful.
Excellent stay at The Aubrey in a great part of town!
Everything was perfect and I'm looking forward to returning! The staff deserve an extra kudos for the exceptional job they do.
A beautifully appointed hotel with lots of character. Very helpful and professional staff. Great ambience and atmosphere
Location and setting so nice to walk from the lobby into the park and hills behind it . Great interior design . Lovely helpful staff .
column12: Noisy air conditioning unit.

column11: Staff were friendly, gave us a lot of information when we first arrived. Hotel was beautiful and they also offered us welcome drinks (pisco sour or wine). Free breakfast included, coffee/tea/drinks and pastries were available throughout the day if you missed the breakfast or hungry late at night. Pool looked very nice and heated as well, although we didn't get a chance to try it ourselves. Room was clean and same as shown in pictures. The place was very big for a boutique hotel, took me a while to find my way around on the first day. Close to restaurants/park/bars and not affected by the noise at all as it is tucked in a corner.
column12: We had a room on the first floor next to the main gate and I believe they were working on the pipes or paving the driveway, but the construction noise was so loud during the day it was rather hard for us to sleep in. We also had to close all the curtains otherwise all the construction workers would have had a nice view of our room, therefore we weren't able to make good use of the natural light and the lights in the room were very dim.

column10: Very pleasant, well located to Bella Vista area and San Christobel Hill
column11: Location, serenity and lovely furnishings, pool looked good but not used.
column12: Room slightly smaller than expected. Narrow staircase tricky for elderly person

column10: Very pleasant and well located hotel
column11: Excellent breakfast and location. Very cozy and quaint boutique hotel
column12: More hanging space in the bathroom for towels is needed

column10: A beautiful renovated house at the foothills of San Cristobal hill
column11: Perfect location and delicious breakfast. The outside pool was still a bit cold for this time of the year. Staff very friendly, especially at breakfast. We would really recommend this place for a lovely stay in Santiago.
column12: Pool water too cold

column10: Stayed 4 nights and was sorry to leave.
column11: Great location, excellent staff, very good breakfasts.

The location is excellent. Right next to the funicular for the statue, Pablo Neruda's house and the bohemian streets.
The hotel is beautifully designed and the staff are wonderful... right from the recepetion, to the  breakfast and the housekeeping...all very friendly and helpful.
column12: A little more hanging space in the bathroom for towels, clothes etc and a few more plug points are needed that are conveniently located for laptops and chargers

column11: Gorgeous building, fabulous garden, friendly staff

column10: Stylish boutique hotel in Bellavista that will make you feel at home
column11: Great boutique hotel in the center of Bellavista. Amazing breakfast and super nice service in general. Recommended.
column12: Nothing.

column10: Great neighborhod- eat pizza at Omerta.
column11:
Fab design!  Lovely staff - front desk and Elizabeth at breakfast.  Just love the building and the imaginative retrofit.
The piano bar is a great space, too.
If it weren’t so cold I would have used the pool.
column12: Nada

column11: The building was interesting; the reception was immediately friendly and helpful. All the staff were welcoming.  The room was large and well appointed. The bed was comfortable. The hotel was very well placed for everything we wanted to do

column10: A gem of a hotel and top notch staff add up to a perfect stopover in Santiago.
column11: Fabulous conversion of a old Colonial residence. Beautiful furnishings and decor and superb location in the Bellavista district of Santiago. All the staff are well informed, engaging and eager to help.
column12: Nothing, it was pretty much perfect

column10: This is a wonderful place to stay, oozing with charm, and a super friendly staff.
column11: Instead of the usual pre-made  buffet scrambled eggs, the Aubrey staff made any kind of eggs, from scratch.
column12:
The only change that I would consider is to make the commode bigger (it was slightly larger
than a pet kennel), and the shower smaller (it was big enough to hold ten or fifteen people.

column11: Great staff, good food, and beautiful interior

This Hotel is a very homely place.  It looks to be a renovated home of one of the well to do families of Santiago, is well located for the main metro (about 800m away), the funicular to Cerro San Cristobel (just around the corner), and local eating places of a range of qualities (fast food to fine dining).  The Bella vista area in which it is located is a lively place being close to two of Santiago's universities and with always young people around.  It was a good base for our final 2 days in Santiago.
column12: Nothing really but access to upper floors is by stairs only.
Noise until 4am from nearby entertainment venues

column10: Chic boutique in the heart of bellavista.
column11: The epitome of chic boutique - tons of character in this fabulous old building. Its location makes it a bit quieter but within easy walking distance to many attractions and all the Bellavista neighborhood has to offer. Lovely, unique room with a very affordable mini bar and complimentary bottled water provided. Staff were exceptional helpful and knowledgeable in recommending local eateries and things to do. Breakfast was the best we had throughout our stay in Chile - fresh everyday and with a good variety of items each day. Perks included the afternoon tea service provided by the hotel, a very good bar on site and the pool. Highly recommend and looking forward to returning.
column12: The walls are a bit thin, which means that you can hear movement around you - not to the point that it bothered us but it may prove troublesome to lighter sleepers.
Location was very noisy at night loud music playing until 4am we were there 4 nights 2 we had no sleep and that was not the weekend can’t imagine what Friday and Saturday are like!!!!

column10: Would highly recommend to anyone and would stay here again on a future trip to Santiago.
column11: The staff here is really exceptional and always working to help you enjoy your stay in and away from the hotel.
column12:
Not much to dislike ,but it could be made clear at booking that this property has multiple floors and levels and does not have an elevator. This could be very important to some people.
Also, the breakfast that is included is from 7:30 to 8:30. A small window if your out late or like to sleep in a bit.

column11:
Beautiful old home, lovingly restored. Great location. Lots of restaurants and bars nearby. Local businesses, not international chains.  Lots of character.
Excellent staff.
column12: A bit of a walk to public transportation.

column11: Friendly staff, good breakfast very comfy accommodation
Nice and helpful staff. Great location

column11:
The staff here was Over the top amazing!!! The hotel was unique yet modern. Large room, very comfortable and clean. Breakfast and coffee was great as well. The bar is comfortable and cozy. 
I wish we were there in summer to take advantage of the outside areas and the pool-- they were beautiful. 
Very close to public trans but a little bit of a hike if you have luggage. Note: an uber to the bus station was $5.50 in rush hour. Totally worth it w luggage
column12: The sink is in the room and no place to "store" toiletries. The overhead lights flickered to off most days, but we just turned on the side lights (in fairness we never complained about the issue bc we were in the room just to get ready)

column11: The staff couldn't be nicer or more helpful
The location, facilities, property and staff were absolutely perfect. Do yourself a favour and stay here.  I promise you will not be disappointed.
column12: Our stay was too short.

column11:
The hotel was beautifully designed and well maintained, and the service was excellent and faultless from beginning to end! 
I arrived early (7AM) and my room was not ready, and they volunteered to put me in a spare room without charge so that I can catch some rest (it was an long & overnight flight). When our room was ready in the afternoon, they offered to pack and take our luggage to the new room.
Then, as we were planning for travel to Atacama and found the airfare price exceedingly expensive (US1,600+), they offered to help us looking for cheaper flights using Spanish-speaking websites, and in doing so, saved us over US$1,000+!
My partner then got sick during our trip (through no fault of the hotel); the hotel staff was quite accommodating and offered extra towels, bedsheets, etc. as & when we needed them, all without complaint or even raising an eyebrow. Even more so, they regularly asked about my partner's health and asked if anything they can do to help!
The breakfast was simple but delicious. The staff always greeted us with a smile and asked what we want to have each morning. The room has all the amenities you need and we have a lovely little courtyard at the back that sees the back of the mountain as well.
Overall, I would recommend this hotel to anyone who's traveling to Santiago.

column10: Quirky hotel, great staff and neighbourhood
column11: Boutique intimate hotel. Loved the furniture and objects d'art. Lots of quiet areas throughout to enjoy. Good area, lots of nice restaurants and bars nearby. Close to underground. Nice bar at the hotel and nice outdoor area would be lovely in summer. Staff gave excellent recommendation for shopping and guide for tour of Valparaiso, Vina del Mar and anywhere in the city you want to go. (Chris Whatmore ). Rachel in the breakfast bar will give you a sunny warm welcome every morning and a lovely breakfast. Staff were all great and spoke good English if your Spanish not too flash.
The attention of the stuff, the private jacuzzi outside the bedroom.

column10: This was our first honeymoon stop. It was wonderful, homely and professional. HUGE RECOMMENDATIONS
column11: Normally I really dislike staying in hotels - they remind me of work- big, impersonal and staff doing a job rather than looking after their guests. Not so with the Aubrey - it has to be one of the loveliest hotels I've stayed in - you almost couldn't call it a hotel - more like a home from home. This was our first stop on honeymoon and I feel quite blessed we chose the Aubrey. Please can I recommend this hotel to everyone - not only is the location beyond fantastic, but the staff are really available to help (whether present or not through their thoughtfulness of just having things availble) and the rooms are well thought out and fabulous. In all my travels this has to be one of the best places I've ever stayed.

column10: Linda decoração, conforto e atendimento excelente!
column11: Fomos muito bem atendidos antes mesmo de chegar, com retorno imediato de dúvidas e solicitações encaminhadas por email. Quarto surpreendeu pela decoração e conforto, além de um cuidado em nos receber com um leve aroma de lavanda. O dono do hotel, Mark, sempre muito simpático e atencioso, nos acolheu maravilhosamente. A localização é ótima, permitindo ir a restaurantes e muitos lugares caminhando. Ao chegarmos, o hotel nos foi apresentado em detalhes pela Belén,  sempre simpática e prestativa. Um mimo (chocolate) é levado ao quarto, todas as tardes... Mais um gesto de simpatia!

column10: Un havre de paix au milieu du quartier animé de Santiago.
column11:
Cet hôtel ressemble plus à un hôtel particulier. Après avoir passé la journée dans Santiago, on a le sentiment de rentrer à la maison !
Situé au pied du parc, la piscine est propice à la détente, surtout accompagné du délicieux cocktail de bienvenu.
Les chambres sont confortables.
L'hôtel est situé au cœur du quartier de Bellavista, connu pour ses bars, ses boites et ses restaurants.
Der Kaffee morgens war einfach schlecht. Aber!!! Das ist auch das EINZIGE, was am Hotel zu bemängeln ist. Würde dort immer wieder buchen und morgens Tee trinken...

A piscina é excelente para passar o final da tarde, após os passeios por Santiago. O café da manhã é muito bom e o serviço do hotel é excelente. A localização do The Aubrey em Bellavista é ótima, ao lado da casa do Pablo Neruda (La Jascona).
很满意，有格调的古堡酒店。幽静的花园，整洁的泳池，全天免费的茶点，非常好。
